mapper.select: SELECT c.review_comment_id, c.review_id, c.user_id, u.nickname AS user_nickname, c.content, c.created_at FROM review_comment c JOIN USER_TABLE u ON c.user_id = u.user_id WHERE c.review_id = #{review_id} AND c.deleted_at IS NULL -- 삭제된 댓글 제외 ORDER BY c.created_at ASC -- 옛날 댓글이 위로
mapper.update: UPDATE review_comment SET deleted_at = SYSDATE WHERE review_comment_id = #{comment_id} AND user_id = #{user_id} -- 본인 확인
